text: hi guys it's angel so it's been really
hot these past few days
and I thought it would be good to share
with you a refreshing summertime drink
that's one of my favorites which is
watermelon juice and basil seed now if
you have had basil seed before they're
kind of like a drink add-in so think
boba but not quite boba it has a texture
that kind of looks like a chia seed but
it's different if I had to compare it to
something I would say it's like poppin
Boas so if you've ever had both over you
can pop it and burst it in your mouth
it's kind of like that and basil seed
has tons of fiber so it's really good
for you so with that let's get started
on the ingredients for this recipe we'll
need two and a quarter cups of ripe
sweet seedless watermelon I just have
them up into cubes put them in the
fridge for a few hours
that way they're cold when we go to use
them we'll also need 3/4 of a cup of
filtered water half a cup of ice cubes
and finally you'll need to reconstitute
your basil seeds at least 15 to 20
minutes before now if you want you can
prepare your basil seeds overnight just
make sure you put them in
so let's start and we'll go ahead and
get our blender out first I'm going to
start with my ice cubes next my
watermelon and add my water give that a
quick blend until everything's fully
blended
should only take a few seconds depending
on your lender then go ahead and add
with watermelon juice it's really
refreshing and on top you spoonfuls and
your basil see I'm gonna shop
punch drop give that a good stir and
voila watermelon juice with basil see
now if you have more than you're able to
drink I recommend getting some mason
jars and storing your extra watermelon
juice in there I hope you guys like this
video and actually try this recipe
because basil seeds in watermelon juice
is a super delicious and refreshing
summer drink now if you're wondering
where to find basil seeds I had a lot of
trouble finding them at my local grocery
store so I just went online and I bought
them and I'll post a link to that in the
video description so with that I will
see you guys next time and Cheers
you
